verses.text: Hear \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* let \w my|strong="H3068"\w* cry come \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w thee|strong="H6440"\w*.

Hide \w not|strong="H8085"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* face \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H8085"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* day \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* distress: incline thine \w ear|strong="H8085"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H8085"\w*; \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* day \w when|strong="H8085"\w* \w I|strong="H8085"\w* \w call|strong="H8085"\w* answer \w me|strong="H8085"\w* speedily.

\w For|strong="H7121"\w* \w my|strong="H5641"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* consume \w away|strong="H5186"\w* \w like|strong="H3117"\w* smoke, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w my|strong="H5641"\w* bones \w are|strong="H3117"\w* burned \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* firebrand.

\w My|strong="H3615"\w* heart \w is|strong="H3117"\w* smitten \w like|strong="H3615"\w* grass, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* withered; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* forget \w to|strong="H3117"\w* eat \w my|strong="H3615"\w* bread.

\w By|strong="H3588"\w* reason \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* voice \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* groaning \w my|strong="H3588"\w* bones cleave \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* flesh.

\w I|strong="H6963"\w* am like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pelican \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* wilderness; \w I|strong="H6963"\w* am become as \w an|strong="H6963"\w* owl \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* waste places.

\w I|strong="H1961"\w* watch, \w and|strong="H4057"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1819"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sparrow \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* alone \w upon|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* housetop.

Mine enemies reproach \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* day; \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H6833"\w* \w are|strong="H1961"\w* mad \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* do curse \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* eaten ashes \w like|strong="H3117"\w* bread, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* mingled \w my|strong="H3605"\w* drink \w with|strong="H3117"\w* weeping.

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3899"\w* thine indignation \w and|strong="H3899"\w* thy wrath: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* hast taken \w me|strong="H3588"\w* up, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* cast \w me|strong="H3588"\w* away.

\w My|strong="H5375"\w* days \w are|strong="H6440"\w* \w like|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* shadow \w that|strong="H3588"\w* declineth; \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am withered \w like|strong="H6440"\w* grass.

\w But|strong="H3117"\w* \w thou|strong="H3117"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, shalt abide \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w ever|strong="H3117"\w*; \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w thy|strong="H5186"\w* memorial \w unto|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3117"\w* generations.

\w Thou|strong="H3427"\w* shalt arise, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w upon|strong="H3427"\w* Zion: \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w it|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w time|strong="H5769"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* pity \w upon|strong="H3427"\w* her, yea, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w set|strong="H3427"\w* \w time|strong="H5769"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* come.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w thy|strong="H6965"\w* servants \w take|strong="H6965"\w* pleasure \w in|strong="H6965"\w* \w her|strong="H6965"\w* stones, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w have|strong="H7355"\w* \w pity|strong="H2603"\w* \w upon|strong="H6965"\w* \w her|strong="H6965"\w* dust.

\w So|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* nations \w shall|strong="H5650"\w* fear \w the|strong="H3588"\w* name \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* all \w the|strong="H3588"\w* kings \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w earth|strong="H6083"\w* \w thy|strong="H5650"\w* glory:

\w For|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* built \w up|strong="H4428"\w* Zion, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* appeared \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*;

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w regarded|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* prayer \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* destitute, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* despised \w their|strong="H3068"\w* prayer.

\w This|strong="H6437"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* written \w for|strong="H8605"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* generation \w to|strong="H6437"\w* come: \w and|strong="H6437"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* which \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* created \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* praise \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5971"\w* \w he|strong="H5971"\w* \w hath|strong="H3050"\w* looked \w down|strong="H3789"\w* \w from|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H1984"\w* height \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w his|strong="H5971"\w* sanctuary; \w from|strong="H5971"\w* heaven \w did|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H1984"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* behold \w the|strong="H1984"\w* earth;

\w To|strong="H3068"\w* hear \w the|strong="H3588"\w* sighing \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* prisoner; \w to|strong="H3068"\w* loose \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H8064"\w* appointed \w to|strong="H3068"\w* death;

\w That|strong="H8085"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w may|strong="H1121"\w* \w declare|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* name \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* Zion, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* praise \w in|strong="H8085"\w* Jerusalem;

\w When|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* peoples \w are|strong="H3068"\w* gathered together, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* kingdoms, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* serve \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.
\w He|strong="H3068"\w* weakened \w my|strong="H3068"\w* strength \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* way; \w he|strong="H3068"\w* shortened \w my|strong="H3068"\w* days.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* said, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H6031"\w* God, take \w me|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H1870"\w* \w away|strong="H1870"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* midst \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H6031"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*: \w thy|strong="H3117"\w* \w years|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w throughout|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3117"\w* generations.

\w Of|strong="H3117"\w* \w old|strong="H8141"\w* hast \w thou|strong="H3117"\w* \w laid|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w foundation|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w earth|strong="H5927"\w*; \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* heavens \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* work \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w thy|strong="H3117"\w* hands.

\w They|strong="H3027"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* perish, but \w thou|strong="H3027"\w* shalt \w endure|strong="H6440"\w*: yea, \w all|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w wax|strong="H3027"\w* \w old|strong="H6440"\w* \w like|strong="H8064"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* garment; \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* vesture shalt \w thou|strong="H3027"\w* change \w them|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w they|strong="H3027"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* changed:

\w But|strong="H1992"\w* \w thou|strong="H5975"\w* art \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w same|strong="H1992"\w*, \w and|strong="H5975"\w* thy years shall \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* end.

\w The|strong="H3808"\w* children \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w thy|strong="H8552"\w* servants \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* continue, \w and|strong="H8141"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* seed \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w established|strong="H3808"\w* \w before|strong="H3808"\w* thee.
